name: Catchcat
description:
Evil Cat escaped into space,catch them and send them down to earth as fast as you can using the teleporting Station.

In this one you control the station slope/tilt that will drive the character movement.

Xbox Controller (recommanded) =>Left controller to inclinate station and make character walk this way.

keyboard =>WASD  keyboard.(Harder)

Game by Middlle and Mazar.

Music :Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Hot Swing" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
